DOC.brief_summary: The Department Vascular Surgery Catharina Hospital Eindhoven , The Netherlands initiate Endurant Challenging Anatomy : Global Experience ( EAGLE ) Registry . The aim study collect clinical information performance Endurant Stent Graft System endovascular repair anatomically challenge aneurysm , critically ass whether current guideline anatomic eligibility endovascular treatment system still applicable . This study aim create database pooled/ compare ENGAGE database . This study aim answer two major question : 1 . Is technical success rate successful delivery deployment Endurant ( II ) similar anatomically challenge aneurysm ? 2 . Is successful treatment rate comparable anatomically challenge aneurysm , treatment aneurysm lead complication reinterventions ?
DOC.brief_title: Endurant Challenging Anatomy : Global Experience Registry
DOC.criteria: Age ≥ 18 year minimum age require local regulation Indication elective EVAR Challenging AAA anatomy Intention electively implant Endurant Endurant II Stent Graft System© Signed informed consent form Subjects intolerance contrast medium Chimneys fenestrated device procedure High probability nonadherence physician 's followup requirement Current participation concurrent trial may confound study result
